text:
DemandCube - San Francisco Downtown - Hadoop/HBase/Kafka/Storm

Looking to fill two positions for 3-6 month contracts to work with me to build out a next generation Analytics Platform. Will be working with a team of 10 to help buildout this platform.

  Hadoop Developer with Java Experience (Scala and C are a bonus)
  Hadoop Sysadmin (Experience with Hadoop 2 is a Bonus)
If your possibly interested, shoot me an email with your resume and what you like working on. steve at demandcube.com
